name: ISO/IEC 10918-1:1994. Information technology -- Digital compression and coding of continuous-tone still images, lossless (formal name); Original lossless JPEG (common name)

relations.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections

description: Lossless compression encoding for full color and grayscale continuous-tone images.  Provides for sequential lossless encoding and decoding. Not based on the DCT [discrete cosine transform] used for regular JPEG.
